name: Speed Car Driving City
description:
Speed Car Driving City is a fun and exciting sports car racing simulator game. Become the driver of some of the fastest cars on the streets of city in a collection of game modes like classic race, countdown, knockdown, and drift.

Drive a top class sports car, join the top street racing tourney. Show your rivals amazing speed in real competition.

Features
- Huge open world, filled with wide open roads, mountains, canyons, hills and forests
- Realistic speed car driving simulation.
- High quality sport cars, ready to race and customise.
- Dynamic camera angles
- Easy to play driving controls, use touch and tilt controls!
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- Different new cars to choose from: sport cars, roadsters, muscle cars!
- Expansive, detailed environment; tons of vistas to explore and drive through.

Now it's your time to join this street racing community. Play now
